attributes.action: To stop Local Council's breaking their own rules regarding Housing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Local council's set rules in order for people on the council housing lists to be rehoused, subsiquently the Council seem to be able to pick and choose in what ever order they wish to help people, usually by helping the people who don't help them selves, and leave the 'decent hard working' families left in poor housing conditions, struggling. Sign this petition and stop us becoming a number on their computer system and make them listen to individual circumstance and needs.
